name: Ricetta: tè alle Vesprobacche
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipes for making Sunset Berry Tea.

value.name: Tramontino
value.desc: Un frutto carnoso, bello come il tramonto, che abbonda in tutta Teyvat. Dal sapore dolciastro e dall'elevato contenuto energetico.

value.name: Bacca
value.desc: Small, brightly-colored fruit. They can be found everywhere, and the taste of them wipes the fatigue of a long journey away.

value.name: Zucchero
value.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

value.name: Tè alle Vesprobacche
value.desc: A fruity drink with a pleasantly sour taste. This scented tea gives off the pleasant aroma of fresh fruit. Its cold and refreshing taste is sure to dispel the stifling heat with each gulp.

value.text: In-game Mail Reward sent on August 29, 2022
